messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I've got a woman in my bank pointing a rifle at all of us and all of our customers. I need police now.
Okay, stay on the line with me. It's a woman, you said?
Oh my God, she's making us go into the vault. I need police here now!
Police are on the way. Stay on the line with me. A woman is holding up the bank?
Yes, she just walked in with a shotgun.
Okay, which bank and where exactly is it located?
Bank of America on the corner of Orangewood Avenue and Central Florida Parkway.
Where are you right now?
I just walked out to my car.
Can you describe the woman for me?
Yes, she's white, has brown hair, wearing a pink tank top and blue jean shorts.
Okay, and you said you saw a shotgun?
Yes, ma'am. I'm moving down the road a little bit, but I can still see the bank.
Please try to stay where you can see the bank safely. Your name?
Okay, hang on. My name is [Name Redacted].
Okay. Can you see anything else?
No, ma'am.
Do you know what she was wearing?
A pink shirt, blue jean shorts.
Okay. Where are you right now?
I moved down to a public area so I wouldn't be in full view of her. I thought it was a joke at first, but then she said it was a stick-up.
You were walking out as she was walking in?
Correct. She said everyone had to give her money, but I was already out the door.
Okay, stay on the line. Let me see if I can transfer you to my dispatcher.
No problem.
Okay, stay on the line. What's your emergency?

Hey, I don't know if this is real, but I'm standing outside the Bank of America on the corner of Orangewood and Central Florida Parkway. There's a lady with a rifle and she's bringing people into the vault. I just walked in and she told me to turn around and get out, so I did.
Yes, we have deputies on the way. Can you describe the woman?
She was Hispanic and around 45 years old.
What was she wearing?
An orange shirt, like a halter top, and black jeans, I think.
Do you know what type of rifle it was?
No, but it was definitely a rifle.
She was putting everyone inside the vault?
Yes, I saw her directing people into the vault.
Can you still see her? Are you in the parking lot?
I'm in the parking lot but I can't see inside the bank from here.
Has she exited the bank yet, as far as you can tell?
No, she hasn't. She's still inside.
Okay, stay where you are and keep safe. We'll have officers there shortly.
Okay, thank you.
